data.text: Na Suhini Bildad buae se,
“Bere bɛn na wubegyae kasa tenten yi?
Adɛn nti na wofa yɛn sɛ anantwi
Wo a wode abufuw tetew wo mu nketenkete,
“Omumɔyɛfo kanea adum;
Hann a ɛwɔ ne ntamadan mu duru sum;
Nʼanammɔntu mu ahoɔden ano bɛbrɛ ase;
Nʼanammɔn de no kɔ afiri mu,
Afiri so ne nantin
Wɔasum no afiri ahintaw wɔ fam;
Ahunahuna ma ɔbɔ huboa wɔ ne ho nyinaa
Atoyerɛnkyɛm kɔn dɔ no;
Ɛwewe ne honam ani baabi;
Wɔtwe no fi ne ntamadan bammɔ mu
Ogya te ne ntamadan mu;
Ne ntin wuwu wɔ ase
Wɔnnkae no asase so bio;
Wɔka no fi hann mu kɔ sum mu
Onni mma anaa nananom wɔ ne nkurɔfo mu,
Nnipa a wofi atɔe fam ho adwiriw wɔn wɔ nea ato no no ho;
Ampa ara, sɛɛ na omumɔyɛfo atenae te;
